text:
该考点的联系人： 陈保新 电话：[redacted_info] [redacted_info]/[redacted_info]。
请在 2024-10-09 前登录中文考试服务网（www.chinesetest.cn），通过个人中心查询“考试记录”进行在线支付，过期未收到您交纳的考试费,您的考试预定将被自动取消。 考试费支付成功以后，无法取消考试和变更考点。
trans:
The contact person for this testing center: Chen Baoxin. Tel: [redacted_info] [redacted_info]/[redacted_info].
Please log in to the Chinese Test Service website (www.chinesetest.cn) before October 9, 2024, and check your “Exam Records” in Personal Center to make an online payment. If we do not receive your exam fee by the deadline, your exam reservation will be automatically canceled. After the exam fee is successfully paid, the exam can’t be canceled and the testing center can’t be changed.
